meta.title: Equilibrium
meta.description: The functionality of all key DeFi apps on one platform, with advanced bailout mechanism for system security. Users can: Lend - All main crypto assets, EQ tokens Borrow - All main crypto assets, decentralized stablecoins, synthetics Trade - All main crypto assets, decentralized stablecoins, synthetics, EQ tokens Stake - PoS & DPoS crypto assets, EQ tokens Solves cross-chain interoperability, unlocking $311 Bln of total remaining DeFi market potential.

title: Equilibrium
